name: nyu
text: Ray thinks its rad to be an alcoholic.

name: ford
text: Ray thinks it is rad to have alcoholism . It sounds better when you own it.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Merry Christmas, Ray.

name: ssddr
text: I like to imagine this strip with ray talking very loudly to himself, with a few other people in the bathroom.

name: deusoma
text: That happened to me once. I assumed the guy had a cell phone. He did not.

name: tekende
text: I hate it when people talk loudly in bathrooms, cell phone or no. It makes it really hard for me to pee. Even worse when they're talking to me.

name: jhunter
text: While at a urinal in a bar one time a fellow next to me began expounding LOUDLY upon his choice of drink that night. Judging from the volume he'd had too damn much of it. When I didn't respond (concentrating instead on my genitals, as one tends to do) he actually nudged me as if he was fully expecting a conversation to arise, maybe a full blown goddamn friendship where we could call each other on the john bi-weekly and keep each other updated on how drunk we were.

name: tekende
text: You should have, as a result of the nudge, "accidentally" pissed all over that douchebag.

name: ninjamike
text:
I remember once I was in a similar bar-urinal situation when my immediate neighbour turned to me, caring not a whit for the fact that I was currently busy pissing, and said, "Hey, dude, do I recognise you from somewhere?"

WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE RECOGNISING OH PLEASE GOD SAY MY FACE

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "finger ticklers"?

name: epicurus
text: I have been here before. When you are drunk, everything seems like a good gift idea. And when you're high, a piece of driftwood with a band's name on it makes a lovely gesture.

name: rotating-dog
text: Ray is drunk enough to consider buying Xmas gifts from the men's room vending machine.

name: lizjones
text: Giving a jimmy hat to a guy that's not getting laid is an extremely rude gesture.

name: catgrl131
text: Do you think it is rad to have alcoholism?

name: rowboat
text: If Ray's going to wear that thong again after it's been dragged all over the floor in the bathroom stall of a strip bar, he should probably be thinking about a jimmy hat for his own damn self. Or three.

name: zzzleepy
text: thank you!  so glad someone else noticed that.  that is yuck-butt and grundle-rot

name: scorpio_nadir
text: This is a cat that had stripper dollars in his mouth and under his eyelids 2 panels earlier, when he was more sober.

name: waldo913
text:
In Hell, the condom machines are INSIDE the stalls!

This saves one the humiliation of purchasing pre-punctured prophylactics in plain view of other restroom users of the damned.

(Do I get extra points for alliteration?)

name: waldo913
text: Ah crap.  This was supposed to go on the thread of the OTHER strip featuring Ray passing out on the can, trying to think of a gift for Roast Beef.

name: deusoma
text: The fact that that's a completely reasonable mistake is one of the many reasons Achewood is so amazing.

name: girlandagun
text: Yes.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: In Hell, this will be a 3-D sculpture to sit next to Rodin's Thinker. Actually, it wouldn't look so bad in the Louvre next to Rodin's Thinker.

name: charchar
text: he could always get one of those lovely 'Exotic treasures' surprise packs. Do the mens' rooms have those?

name: boredom_man
text: Not unless you consider a pack of Camels, a glowing rubber and a thimbleful of K-Y exotic, no.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: A jimmy hat would be one of the better gifts Roast Beef Katzensakis has received for Christmas.  One year, Showbiz gave him a crack rock wrapped in a crumpled piece of paper.  Later Beef realized the piece of paper was a carbon copy of the bank form that Showbiz had fraudulently used to transfer his debt to Roast Beef.  He signed Roast Beefs name with an X.  Unfortunately, due to his depression, this is in fact how Roast Beef signs his name.

name: dangelder
text:
Meow.

[IMGS OFF]

Double Meow.

name: jollysaintpete
text: meow what is this all about

name: miaou
text: miaou , this is what it's all about!

name: margsauce
text: this is getting a 5 for thong movement

name: kyrasmash
text: I have known too many Christmas nights that turned out like this to not warrant a five

name: ineptmule
text: The tragic and bittersweet nature of this strip touches me.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Just because of this strip I will be giving all of my friends jimmy hats for Christmas. Thanks Ray!

name: shoinan
text: Harvey Dent should have had that coin - much more interesting.

name: boredom_man
text: I flip the coin, and I either kiss Gordon all over his body, or perform cunnilingus on him. FAIR.

name: epicurus
text:
"You know the thing about Cunnilingus, Harvey?

It's FAIR."

Actually it kind of isn't.

name: boatshow
text: Uh, didn't he get Roast Beef a car already?
